home.missionDesc: Guha imbaraga abaturage binyuze mu buvugizi, uburezi n'ibikorwa
home.missionText: Gufasha imiryango yoroshye, imfubyi, abapfakazi, n'imiryango ibangamiwe binyuze muri gahunda zuzuye zigarura icyubahiro, zitanga ubufasha bwihutirwa, ziteza imbere uburezi, zikomeretsa indangagaciro, kandi ziha imbaraga abaturage kugira ngo bigenere.
home.visionText: Umuryango aho imiryango yoroshye igira uburyo bwo kurindwa n'imibereho, ubufasha bwihutirwa, uburezi bwiza, ubuyobozi bw'umwuka, n'amahirwe yo kwigenera kugira ngo iterambere rirambe.
home.impactIntro: Binyuze muri gahunda zacu z'ingenzi - kurinda imibereho, ubufasha bwihutirwa, uburezi, ibikorwa bishingiye ku idini, guha imbaraga abagore n'urubyiruko, no kurinda imiryango - tugira uruhare runini mu miryango yo mu Rwanda.
home.studentsSupported: Abanyeshuri mu Ishuri rya Rwamagana Buri Mwaka
home.womenEmpowered: Abagore Bahawe Imbaraga Binyuze mu Mahugurwa
home.futureDesc: Ejo hazaza aho buri mwana akura mu cyubahiro, buri mugore abaho adafite urugomo, kandi buri muryango ufite umutekano n'ubumenyi bwo kubaka ejo hazaza heza.

hero.slide1Title: Murakaza neza kuri Umbrella for Vulnerable!
hero.slide1Subtitle: Gutanga ubufasha bwihutirwa mu gihe cy'ibibazo, ibiza, n'ibikenewe byihutirwa mu muryango kugira ngo habeho igisubizo cyihuse no gukira.
hero.slide2Subtitle: Turashyira mu bikorwa gahunda zuzuye zirimo kurinda imibereho, ubufasha bwihutirwa, uburezi, ibikorwa bishingiye ku idini, guha imbaraga abagore n'urubyiruko, no kurinda imiryango kugira ngo dufashe imiryango yoroshye.
hero.slide3Subtitle: Binyuze muri gahunda zacu z'ingenzi, tugarura icyubahiro n'umutekano ku miryango yoroshye, dutanga ubufasha bwihutirwa, duteza imbere uburezi, dukomeza indangagaciro, kandi duha imbaraga abagore n'urubyiruko kugira ngo bigenere.

programs.title: Gahunda Zacu
programs.subtitle: Binyuze muri gahunda zacu zitandukanye, dukirikirana tukana kemura ibibazo byinshi bitandukanye harimo, gushoboza, akazi n'amahirwe yo gukora ibikorwa birambye mu miryango.
programs.socialProtectionDesc: Gufasha imiryango yoroshye, imfubyi, abapfakazi, n'imiryango ibangamiwe kugira ngo hagarurwe icyubahiro n'umutekano binyuze mu bufasha buzuye n'inkunga y'abaturage.
programs.emergencyReliefDesc: Gutanga ubufasha bwihutirwa mu gihe cy'ibibazo, ibiza, n'ibikenewe byihutirwa mu muryango kugira ngo habeho igisubizo cyihuse no gukira.
programs.educationDesc: Guteza imbere uburyo bwo kubona uburezi, amahugurwa y'umwuga, n'iterambere ry'ubuzima bw'abana n'urubyiruko kugira ngo bubake ejo hazaza rirambye.
programs.faithBasedDesc: Gukomeza indangagaciro, imbaraga z'umwuka, n'ubuyobozi bw'imyitwarire binyuze mu nyigisho z'idini n'inama kugira ngo habeho impinduka mu muryango.
programs.womenYouth: Gahunda zo Guha Imbaraga Abagore n'Urubyiruko
programs.womenYouthDesc: Guha abagore n'urubyiruko ubushobozi, umutungo, n'amahirwe yo kwigenera no kugira ubwisanzure mu bukungu.
programs.familyProtection: Gahunda zo Kurinda Imiryango no Gukumira Gutandukana
programs.familyProtectionDesc: Kurinda umuryango mu kugabanya impamvu zituma abantu batandukana binyuze mu nyigisho z'idini, inama, ibiganiro, n'ubuhuza bw'imiryango.

footer.description: Umbrella for Vulnerable ishyira mu bikorwa gahunda zo kurinda imibereho, ubufasha bwihutirwa, uburezi, ibikorwa bishingiye ku idini rya Islam, guha imbaraga abagore n'urubyiruko, no kurinda imiryango kugira ngo dufashe imiryango yoroshye n'abaturage.
footer.socialMediaText: Dukorane kuri imbuga nkoranyambaga kugira ngo ubone amakuru kuri gahunda zacu, inkuru z'ingaruka, n'uburyo bwo kwitabira.
footer.copyright: Â© 2026 Umbrella for Vulnerable. Uburenganzira bwose burarinzwe.

contact.getInTouchDesc: Turi hano kugira ngo duguhe ubufasha kandi tusubize ibibazo byose ushobora kugira. Twiteguye kukumva!
contact.name: Izina

contactPage.heroDesc: Reka dukorane kugira ngo dukore impinduka zirambye
contactPage.getInTouchDesc: Ufite ibibazo cyangwa ushaka kwitabira? Twishimira kukumva.
contactPage.name: Izina
contactPage.subject: Ingingo
contactPage.successMessage: Murakoze ku butumwa bwanyu! Tuzabasubiza vuba.
contactPage.errorMessage: Ntibyashobotse kohereza ubutumwa. Nyamuneka ongera ugerageze.

aboutUs.title: Inkunga Yacu Umbrella for Vulnerable?
aboutUs.description: Kuko tuzi ko n'ubwo gahunda nziza ari nziza gusa nk'abantu bayikorera. Niyo mpamvu dutanga inkunga yuzuye, guha imbaraga abaturage, n'ibisubizo birambye bikora ingaruka zirambye mu miryango yoroshye yo mu Rwanda.

programsPage.heroDesc: Gufasha imiryango yoroshye binyuze muri gahunda zuzuye
programsPage.socialProtectionDesc: Gufasha imiryango yoroshye, imfubyi, abapfakazi, n'imiryango ibangamiwe kugira ngo hagarurwe icyubahiro n'umutekano binyuze mu bufasha buzuye n'inkunga y'abaturage.
programsPage.directAssistanceDesc: Gutanga inkunga ihuse ku miryango yoroshye harimo ibiryo, aho gutura, n'ibikenewe by'ibanze
programsPage.capacityBuildingDesc: Guha imiryango ubushobozi n'umutungo kugira ngo bigenere mu gihe kirekire
programsPage.communityIntegrationDesc: Guhuza imiryango yoroshye n'imiyoboro y'inkunga y'abaturage n'umutungo
programsPage.emergencyReliefDesc: Gutanga ubufasha bwihutirwa mu gihe cy'ibibazo, ibiza, n'ibikenewe byihutirwa mu muryango kugira ngo habeho igisubizo cyihuse no gukira.
programsPage.foodShelter: Gukwirakwiza ibiryo, aho gutura, n'ubufasha bw'ubuvuzi
programsPage.communityRecovery: Inkunga yo gukira no kugarura umuryango
programsPage.educationDesc: Guteza imbere uburyo bwo kubona uburezi, amahugurwa y'umwuga, n'iterambere ry'ubuzima bw'abana n'urubyiruko kugira ngo bubake ejo hazaza rirambye.
programsPage.schoolFees: Inkunga y'amafaranga y'ishuri ku bana boroshye
programsPage.faithBasedDesc: Gukomeza indangagaciro, imbaraga z'umwuka, n'ubuyobozi bw'imyitwarire binyuze mu nyigisho z'idini n'inama kugira ngo habeho impinduka mu muryango.
programsPage.womenYouth: Gahunda zo Guha Imbaraga Abagore n'Urubyiruko
programsPage.womenYouthDesc: Guha abagore n'urubyiruko ubushobozi, umutungo, n'amahirwe yo kwigenera no kugira ubwisanzure mu bukungu.
programsPage.digitalLiteracy: Uburezi bwa digitale n'uburyo bwo kubona ikoranabuhanga
programsPage.familyProtection: Gahunda zo Kurinda Imiryango no Gukumira Gutandukana
programsPage.familyProtectionDesc: Kurinda umuryango mu kugabanya impamvu zituma abantu batandukana binyuze mu nyigisho z'idini, inama, ibiganiro, n'ubuhuza bw'imiryango.
programsPage.familyProtectionDesc2: Dutanga serivisi zuzuye z'inama ku miryango, gukemura amakimbirane, na gahunda z'uburezi kugira ngo dukomeze isano y'umuryango kandi tukumire gusenyuka kw'imiryango.

aboutPage.heroDesc: Gufasha imiryango yoroshye binyuze muri gahunda zuzuye
aboutPage.missionText1: Kuri Umbrella for Vulnerable, turashyira mu bikorwa gahunda zuzuye zirimo kurinda imibereho, ubufasha bwihutirwa, uburezi, ibikorwa bishingiye ku idini, guha imbaraga abagore n'urubyiruko, no kurinda imiryango kugira ngo dufashe imiryango yoroshye n'abaturage.
aboutPage.missionText2: Binyuze mu kazi kacu mu miryango itandukanye, twabonye imirwano ya buri munsi imiryango yoroshye ihura na yo, kandi twiyemeje gukemura izo mbogamizi binyuze muri gahunda z'inkunga zihuriweho kandi zuzuye.
aboutPage.visionText: Umuryango aho imiryango yoroshye igira uburyo bwo kurindwa n'imibereho, ubufasha bwihutirwa, uburezi bwiza, ubuyobozi bw'umwuka, n'amahirwe yo kwigenera kugira ngo iterambere rirambe kandi bigenere.
aboutPage.povertyDesc: Ubukene bukabije bugira ingaruka ku miryango yoroshye, imfubyi, abapfakazi, n'imiryango ibangamiwe
aboutPage.emergencyDesc: Ibiza, ibibazo, n'ibikenewe byihutirwa mu muryango bisaba igisubizo cyihuse cy'ubuntu
aboutPage.opportunitiesDesc: Kubura uburyo bwo kubona uburezi, amahugurwa y'umwuga, n'amahirwe yo kwigenera mu bukungu
aboutPage.responseText1: Ibi bibazo bisaba ibisubizo byuzuye kandi bihuriweho bikemura ibikenewe byihutirwa n'iterambere rirambye. Uburyo bwacu buhuza ubufasha butaziguye n'ubushobozi bwo kubaka no guha imbaraga.
aboutPage.responseText2: Turashyira mu bikorwa gahunda esheshatu z'ingenzi zikorana kugira ngo dutange inkunga yuzuye: kurinda imibereho, ubufasha bwihutirwa, uburezi, ibikorwa bishingiye ku idini, guha imbaraga abagore n'urubyiruko, na gahunda zo kurinda imiryango.
aboutPage.integrityDesc: Kubahiriza ubunyangamugayo no gusobanura mu kazi kwacu kwose
aboutPage.compassionDesc: Kwerekana impuhwe n'ubwitange ku miryango yose dukorera
aboutPage.partnersDesc: Dufatanije n'imiryango itangaje kugira ngo dukore ingaruka zirambye mu miryango yo mu Rwanda.

impactPage.heroDesc: Ibisubizo nyabyo biva muri gahunda zacu zo mu Rwanda
impactPage.familySupportDesc: Gutanga kurinda imibereho kuzuye no kugarura icyubahiro
impactPage.qualityEducationDesc: Guha abanyeshuri imbaraga binyuze mu bumenyi buzuye
impactPage.womenEmpowermentDesc: Kubaka ubwisanzure mu bukungu binyuze mu mahugurwa
impactPage.familyProtectionDesc: Gukomeza imiryango binyuze mu buhuza n'inama
impactPage.comprehensiveEducationDesc: Kurera abanyeshuri mu muryango w'ishuri rya Rwamagana
impactPage.learningResourcesDesc: Gutanga ibikoresho n'ibikoresho by'ingenzi kugira ngo utsinde
impactPage.womenTrainingDesc: Iterambere ry'ubushobozi buzuye no guha imbaraga mu bukungu
impactPage.youthLeadershipDesc: Gahunda zo gutoza no guteza imbere ubuyobozi
impactPage.economicIndependenceDesc: Kubaka inzira zo kwigenera no gukomeza
impactPage.socialProtectionTitle: Ingaruka zo Kurinda Imibereho n'Ubufasha bwihutirwa
impactPage.dignityRestorationDesc: Gufasha imiryango yoroshye n'impuhwe n'ubwitange buzuye
impactPage.crisisResponseDesc: Gutanga ubufasha bwihutirwa igihe abaturage bakeneye cyane
impactPage.familyCounselingDesc: Gutanga ubuhuza n'inkunga kugira ngo dukomeze isano y'umuryango
impactPage.faithBasedTitle: Bishingiye ku Idini no Kurinda Imiryango
impactPage.familyMediation: Gahunda zo guhuza imiryango no gukumira gutandukana
impactPage.ethicalLeadership: Gahunda zo guteza imbere ubuyobozi bw'imyitwarire
impactPage.joinUsDesc: Hamwe, turashobora gukora impinduka zirambye mu miryango yo mu Rwanda. Inkunga yawe iradufasha kwagura uruhare rwacu no kongera ingaruka zacu.

donatePage.heroDesc: Impano yawe ifasha guhindura ubuzima mu Rwanda
donatePage.dialMtn: Kanda *182*8*1*1111111# kuri telefone yawe ya MTN
donatePage.directImpactDesc: 100% y'impano yawe ijya mu gahunda zihindura ubuzima
donatePage.transparencyDesc: Amakuru ahorwa ku buryo uruhare rwawe rugira ingaruka
donatePage.communityLedDesc: Gushyigikira ibisubizo by'aho kugira ngo habeho impinduka zirambye
donatePage.togetherDesc: Buri ruhare, nubwo ruto, rudufasha gukora impinduka zirambye mu buzima bw'imiryango yo mu Rwanda.
donatePage.thankYou: Murakoze ku buntu bwanyu no kudushyigikira!
